page.title: 18Buses - Mountain Goat
page.content: The Mountain Goat bus company has been the pioneer of a new approach to the problems of providing a commercial transport service in an upland area which is attractive to tourists but where the road network does not allow the operation of large buses and rigid timetables except on the main roads. The company was established in the early 70's, initially to provide a mini-bus service in areas which the big Ribble bus company would not cover such as Windermere - Patterdale and the rural area west of the lake. Now, with a fleet of mini-buses and a couple of coaches, the company has expanded to provide scheduled servies to Glenridding over Kirkstone Pass and to York, and regular tours all over the Lake District from both Windermere and Keswick. It also takes children to school and does a group taxi service.
